TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AdornerHitTestResult extends System.Windows.Media.PointHitTestResult

Docs.summary: Represents data returned from calling the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerLayer.AdornerHitTest%2A> method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks In addition to the visual and point information provided by the base class <xref:System.Windows.Media.PointHitTestResult>, this class uses the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.AdornerHitTestResult.Adorner%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to return the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Adorner> that was hit (since there may be multiple Visuals in a single <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Adorner>).

Docs.summary: Gets the visual that was hit.

remarks.format: ## Remarks There may be multiple visuals in a single <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Adorner>. This property returns the visual that was actually hit.
